overview: In a small farm, there live three women with a sisterly relationship. Pina, the girl with a bright disposition, is loved by Mithi and Ilaya as she always tries her best to hold the group together. Not until a stranger, who calls herself Rika, comes knocking on their door. The stranger sparks Ilaya and Mithi's curiosity then deliberately turns them against Pina.
title: Pina
